Allentown.WBPH-TV:
WBPH-TV, virtual channel 60 (VHF digital channel 9), is a religious independent television station serving Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States that is licensed to Bethlehem. Owned by Sonshine Family Television, WBPH-TV maintains offices and studio facilities in Allentown, and its transmitter is located on South Mountain near Allentown (specifically Salisbury Township in the Lehigh Valley region of the state).


== History ==
The station was an outgrowth of Christian programming that Pat Huber had begun on a local public-access cable television channel.
